A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars: The Last Jedi is what a good middle movie should be. It resolves some questions as it begins at the end of the Force Awakens but doesn't finish the story. The movie excels at giving a sense of the stakes. A few elements seemed out of place. The Last Jedi does an excellent job of subverting viewers expectations and taking the Saga in a new direction.
